markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tough Tumbler](/Feats.aspx?ID=1222) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 73</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Scamper Underfoot](/Feats.aspx?ID=1218)

</column>

---

You’ve taken your share of licks while scurrying around the battlefield and know how to defend yourself against opportunistic attackers. Your movement ends only when you critically fail an [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) check to [Tumble Through](/Actions.aspx?ID=29) an enemy’s space (or when you don’t have enough Speed to move all the way through its space). You still trigger reactions on a failure to Tumble Through, but you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks that you trigger in this way.
name: Tough Tumbler

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 5" pfs="Standard" > Tough Tumbler Source Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows pg. 73 Prerequisites Scamper Underfoot --- You’ve taken your share of licks while scurrying around the battlefield and know how to defend yourself against opportunistic attackers. Your movement ends only when you critically fail an Acrobatics check to Tumble Through an enemy’s space (or when you don’t have enough Speed to move all the way through its space). You still trigger reactions on a failure to Tumble Through, but you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks that you trigger in this way.
